title: Forsaken: Switch 2
description: BOOK 2 in the SWITCH SERIES!Fifteen-year-old Nova Grant learned too late that changing the future can tragically impact the past. Now she must find a way to undo her mistake before it's too late. But how can she bring back someone who has never existed? Especially when she's starting to forget...*All books in the SWITCH Series are clean young adult â€“ no graphic language or sex and no drug/alcohol use. They are safe to recommend for young teens!*BOOK 3 in the Switch Series- RETURN
author: M.H. Rice
